title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 97.10 - Representation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 97.10 - Representation

State Regulations

Any respondent who requests a hearing or is compelled to appear before the Attorney

General has the right to be represented by counsel or a non-lawyer representative. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
97.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
